title: Champions of Sport No.1
creator_credit: John Betts and Grand National Pictures
brief_description: This short film discusses the technique, history and famous sports-people of the 1940s, focusing on hurlding, golf and high jumping. The athletes spotlighted are D.O. Finlay (hurdler), Pam Barton (golfer) and C.C. Johnson (high jumper)
